user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot shows a shopping cart page on Amazon. It lists two items: an LG UltraGear Gaming Monitor priced at $199.99 and a MacBook Pro case priced at $19.80, with a subtotal of $219.79. There are options to proceed to checkout or save items for later. The cart also includes a checkbox for sending items as a gift and a delivery location set to the Netherlands.
